markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Kabriri](/Articles.aspx?ID=69)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #184: The Ghouls Hunger](/Sources.aspx?ID=147) pg. 68

If you bear a gnawing hunger for knowledge about the demon lord of [ghouls](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=52) [Kabriri](/Deities.aspx?ID=76) this article gives a taste of his history and his hungering minions.
name: Kabriri
